title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 9
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 9
description:
From a hotel room in The Horse Capital of the World, Action Network experts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter quickly run through their favorite sides for this week's NFL slate, including their Big Balls Bet of the Week, and an underdog round robin parlay that's sure to please. #Volume #Herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
